name: Victory Rush
simple_desc:
At the start of battle or when an enemy's Weakness is Broken, gains Charge.
After any ally target performs an attack, if fully Charged, launches Follow-up ATK and deals Fire DMG to all enemies, consuming all Charge points.
desc:
When an enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, Himeko gains 1 point of Charge (max #2[i] points).
If Himeko is fully Charged when an ally performs an attack, Himeko immediately performs 1 Follow-up ATK and deals Fire DMG equal to #1[i]% of her ATK to all enemies, consuming all Charge points.
At the start of the battle, Himeko gains 1 point of Charge.
